entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for July 01, 2024

summary.caption:
After 23 uneventful years at the zoo’s snakehouse,
curator Ernie Schwartz has a cumulative attack of
the willies.

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for July 01, 2024

summary.caption: Tarzan is greeted by the Parakeet People.

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for July 01, 2024

summary.caption: “On the other hand, gentlemen, what if we gave a war and everybody came?”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for July 01, 2024

summary.caption: "Well, like I said, a mammoth shouldn’t be allowed in the cave to begin with—but installing a swinging door was just plain crazy!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for July 01, 2024

summary.caption: “Hold it right there, Frank! … If you’re gonna shake, you do it in another room!”
